vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.15.18
§ Ben = "son"
a Levite, one of the porters appointed by David for the ark
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   hijo, descendiente; (2)   levita; en tiempos del rey David
